HeroSection.title: Transform Your Body & Life
HeroSection.content: Get personalized fitness and nutrition coaching that fits your lifestyle. Science-based approach, sustainable results.

AssessmentSection.title: Free Fitness Assessment
AssessmentSection.content: Discover your unique fitness profile with our free assessment. Understand your body, set realistic goals, and start your journey to a healthier you.
AssessmentSection.Name: Name
AssessmentSection.ExperiencePlaceholder: Tell us about your fitness background, any injuries, or specific concerns...

AboutSection.title: Your Transformation Partner
AboutSection.content: With over a decade of experience in fitness and nutrition coaching, I've helped hundreds of clients achieve sustainable transformations. My approach combines scientific principles with practical, real-world application.

AssessmentSuccess.title: Thank You for Your Assessment!
AssessmentSuccess.content1: Your custom fitness plan is being prepared. Want faster results and personalized guidance?
AssessmentSuccess.content2: Book a free 15-minute strategy call to accelerate your transformation.

services.title: Personal Training
services.description: Customized workout programs designed for your goals, fitness level, and schedule. Progressive training that adapts as you grow stronger.

services.title: Nutrition Coaching
services.description: Evidence-based nutrition strategies that fit your lifestyle. Learn sustainable eating habits for long-term success.

services.title: Progress Tracking
services.description: Comprehensive monitoring of your transformation journey. Data-driven adjustments to optimize your results.

CalSection.title: Ready to Start Your Transformation?
CalSection.content: Based on your assessment, let's create your personalized plan. Book a free 15-minute consultation to discuss your results and next steps.
